channel.title: TV Show Reviews on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in TV Show Reviews on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: Eyes of Wakanda feels like fanfiction turned into Marvel history
item.description: Ryan Coogler’s first Black Panther feature set itself apart by pushing audiences to think about how comic book heroes and villains would fit into a world shaped by horrors like the trans-Atlantic slav
